name: torch
notes: PyTorch - Core ML framework. Primary license BSD-3-Clause, but includes bundled components under Apache-2.0 (e.g., torch/_vendor/packaging). Both licenses are permissive and compatible.

name: transformers
notes: Hugging Face Transformers library. Has transitive dependencies (filelock, huggingface-hub, numpy, packaging, pyyaml, regex, requests, tokenizers, safetensors, tqdm) - all permissively licensed (Apache-2.0, MIT, BSD-3-Clause, PSF). Transitive dependencies are not individually inventoried per policy.

name: bitsandbytes
notes: Quantization library for QLoRA. MIT license allows redistribution, but includes CUDA binaries subject to NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit EULA. Binary redistribution requires compliance with NVIDIA EULA terms. Source code redistribution under MIT is unrestricted.

name: psycopg2-binary
notes: PostgreSQL adapter. LGPL-3.0 allows dynamic linking only. Static bundling is FORBIDDEN. Used via Python's dynamic import mechanism (standard pip installation), which constitutes dynamic linking. No static linking occurs. RansomEye code is not a derivative work.

name: uuid
notes: Python UUID generation library (distinct from Rust uuid crate)

name: uuid
notes: Rust UUID generation crate (distinct from Python uuid package) - dual licensed
